video.name: VEGAN LOW FAT BISCUITS | 30 MINUTE SAVOURY BISCUIT RECIPE - Vegan Richa Recipes
video.description:
VEGAN LOW FAT BISCUITS

Get the WRITTEN RECIPE here - https://www.veganricha.com/oil-free-vegan-biscuits/

SUBSCRIBE HERE: https://www.youtube.com/veganricharecipes?sub_confirmation=1

******MORE SIDES FROM THE BLOG******

SOFT WHOLE WHEAT DINNER ROLLS WITH TANZHONG STARTER: https://www.veganricha.com/soft-whole-wheat-dinner-rolls/

VEGAN SWEET POTATO ROLLS: https://www.veganricha.com/vegan-sweet-potato-rolls/

JALAPENO PEPPER JACK GLUTEN-FREE BISCUITS RECIPE : https://www.veganricha.com/gluten-free-jalapeno-pepper-jack/

COOKBOOKS BY RICHA HINGLE (VEGAN RICHA): https://www.veganricha.com/mybooks/

Connect with me on Social Media:

Music: Epidemic Sound 

#veganbiscuits #nooilbiscuits #lowfatbiscuits #veganricha #easyveganrecipes

recipeIngredient: 1/2 tsp salt ((2/3 if you like biscuits salty))
2 tsp dried herbs ((I used basil, rosemary and chives, 1 tbsp if fresh))
1/4 cup mashed sweet potato or mashed potato ((chilled for at least an hour))
1/3 cup coconut cream ((heaping cup - chilled overnight))
1/3 cup non dairy milk ((such as almond or soy))
Vegan cheese shreds, 1 tbsp nutritional yeast, 1/2 tsp garlic powder or minced jalapeno

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the oven to 425 deg F ( 218 C). Line a thick baking sheet with parchment paper.
recipeInstructions.name: Preheat the oven to 425 deg F ( 218 C). Line a thick baking sheet with parchment paper.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the flour, salt, baking powder, baking soda, herbs to a shallow bowl. Whisk to mix well.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the flour, salt, baking powder, baking soda, herbs to a shallow bowl. Whisk to mix well.

recipeInstructions.text: Mix the lime juice in the non dairy milk and set aside.
recipeInstructions.name: Mix the lime juice in the non dairy milk and set aside.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the chilled sweet potato mash and coconut cream. Use a pastry cutter or fork to mix them in until the flour has some even fat crumbs.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the chilled sweet potato mash and coconut cream. Use a pastry cutter or fork to mix them in until the flour has some even fat crumbs.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the curdled non dairy milk a few tbsp at  a time. Use a spatula to mix it in until just about a dough.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the curdled non dairy milk a few tbsp at  a time. Use a spatula to mix it in until just about a dough.

recipeInstructions.text: Use a tablespoon of flour if needed and quickly bring the dough together into a flat rectangle with the spatula or hands.
recipeInstructions.name: Use a tablespoon of flour if needed and quickly bring the dough together into a flat rectangle with the spatula or hands.

recipeInstructions.text: Use a 1.5 inch cookie cutter to cut out biscuits. Place biscuits on parchment lined baking sheet just about touching each other. Press the middle of the biscuits lightly with a finger, to make a slight dip. (Freeze the shaped biscuits on a baking sheet. When frozen, store in air tight container or bag. Bake directly from the freezer. You will need to add 3 to 4 mins additional baking time for frozen biscuits)
recipeInstructions.name: Use a 1.5 inch cookie cutter to cut out biscuits. Place biscuits on parchment lined baking sheet just about touching each other. Press the middle of the biscuits lightly with a finger, to make a slight dip. (Freeze the shaped biscuits on a baking sheet. When frozen, store in air tight container or bag. Bake directly from the freezer. You will need to add 3 to 4 mins additional baking time for frozen biscuits)

recipeInstructions.text: Bake for 13 to 15 mins. Take off the sheet when done.
recipeInstructions.name: Bake for 13 to 15 mins. Take off the sheet when done.

recipeInstructions.text: Brush with vegan butter/oil if needed, or brush some aquafaba. Serve immediately with gravy of choice. These biscuits are best served warm.
recipeInstructions.name: Brush with vegan butter/oil if needed, or brush some aquafaba. Serve immediately with gravy of choice. These biscuits are best served warm.
